https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/9423
If we like the feature, then I would like to mark it "help wanted". What to we think?

The original implementation included host, but in https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/7376#issuecomment-533294471 @Alex Crichton suggested removing it. I think it should probably be OK to add it back in. There is a precedent with cargo tree --target all using "all" as a special name, so I think adding "host" for --filter-platform wouldn't be too strange.
IIRC I mainly wanted to make sure we made a concerted effort to add this to Cargo rather than only adding it one place instead of all. For example should we also support --target host (probably?)
but I don't have anything like an intrinsic feeling against this feature, I think it's fine to add, just need to consider it relative to everything else in Cargo
